content: I'm also thinking of organizing a dinner party soon, and I want to make sure I have all the necessary kitchen utensils and appliances in good condition. Speaking of which, I got my stand mixer back from the repair shop, and I had to bake a few things by hand in the meantime. Do you have any recommendations for essential kitchen utensils that I might need for my dinner party, especially ones that would be helpful in case my stand mixer breaks down again?
